website_summaries.verdict: A manual eye massager for those who don't want to mess with vibration, heat, charging, or changing batteries.
pros: One end of the tool is a spoon for dipping into cream, the other end features a massager
Can be used to promote cream absorption

customer_reviews.title: Tugs at skin
customer_reviews.text: This product came in good condition and the description is as advertised, however, I would not recommend this product since I find that I have to drag it under my eyes and it tugs at my skin. I bought this because I thought it would be a nice and cheap alternative to the roller eye sticks that glide over the skin. I find that since it doesn’t have the roller ball at the end, it’s not especially comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: don’t you hate to get cream under nails
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I was doing before I discovered this product. Ladies with longer nails, don’t you hate to get cream under nails, yes, this is saver. I bought this for every lady in my family.
customer_reviews.author: Nikadim

customer_reviews.title: Small but works
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected but working just fine, if you set it In the fridge to get cold works great for under eyes
customer_reviews.author: Samai

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: i don’t understand what could have been wrong, it’s basicallt a little ball you put around your eyes. i use it in the morning to help with depuffing and at night to rub in eye cream. it has a nice cooling effect
customer_reviews.author: reg

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I use this every night and morning to massage my eye bags
customer_reviews.author: Andreina

customer_reviews.title: Good for applying eye cream.
customer_reviews.text: I keep in fridge with caffeine eye cream. Great when applying the cream under my eyes!
customer_reviews.author: Dana S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect size , I love it.. looks super fancy and gets the job done . Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! Easy application and gives my eyes a nice massage. Great for the money.
customer_reviews.author: TDA

customer_reviews.title: I feel like these should be sold in pairs
customer_reviews.text: I feel like these should be sold in pairs. I dont really like the idea of using it on both eyes at the same time without sanitizing it.
customer_reviews.author: LC Amazon Lover

customer_reviews.title: This stick is a life saver, a bit heavier ...
customer_reviews.text: This stick is a life saver, a bit heavier than i thought it would be. But, loving it just the same
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: It feels so luxurious
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to apply eye creams and to massage my eye area and this product delivers. It's solid metal and cool to the touch. The rounded tip glides of the skin with or without a cream or oil, but it feels much nicer if one is used. It works well to de-puff as well as to apply creams--and not have them absorb into my hand!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: So gentle in the fragile eye area.Second one I’ve purchased!
customer_reviews.text: As an Esthetician, I advise my clients to not dip fingers in product jars, as that results in cross-contamination. This is the perfect solution to that as well as the gentlest way to apply your eye cream.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It makes applying my eye cream a very soothing/relaxing experience. Great for travel too.
customer_reviews.author: WAVE0503

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly and packaged nicely. It is a nice solid weight and rolls easily over eyes with cream. You can actually watch the swelling move to the side as you pull it out that way.
customer_reviews.author: Okpaise

product_meta.title: Eye Cream Massage Sticks Wrinkle Remove Eye Massage Tool
product_meta.description:
Eye Cream Massager Wand Skin Care Massage Tool, Eye Cream Applicator Facial Massager Cooling



This eye cream massager has two different ends. One end is the spoon to get the eye cream while the other end is the eye cream massage ball. On one hand, it can relieve eye fatigue, eye nerves, compact eye skin and remove wrinkles. On the other hand, its spoon end can take the eye cream without any pollution.



How To Use:



Step 1: Use the eye cream massager to dip the right amount of eye cream.

Step 2: Then gently along the contours of the eye from outside to inside sliding massage.

Step 3: With your fingers gently click on the face to promote eye cream absorption.



Features



♥ Reduce wrinkles around eyes, lips, forehead & neck



♥ It is good to remove eye pouch, dark circles



♥ Relleve eye nerves and eye fatigue, promote skin blood circulation



♥ Creating an antimicrobial surface for safe contact with your skin



♥ Portable size made it became a masseur for your body when you need







Specification



Material: Zinc Alloy



Color: Sliver



Size: 100mmx14mm







Package Included:



1 x Eye Massager Tool
feature_bullets: Unique design, one end of the massager is the spoon for the cream to prevent the cream pollution; the other end is the eye cream massager to promote eye cream absorption, but also can reduce the edema of the eye
Zinc alloy material, durable, smooth surface,improve eye microcirculation.
Mini design, handy,portable,compact and easy to carry.
eye massage,helps to reduce eye puffy，black bags under the eyes, shade，and uneven skin-tone. It is a great Very easy to use eye ball roller, don’t need to worry about massage method skin tool.
Very easy to use, don’t need to worry about massage method
